instruction: How could a company benefit from using a customer satisfaction survey?
output: A customer satisfaction survey helps companies gain insight into customer needs and issues, enabling them to improve the customer experience and increase satisfaction. It also provides feedback on products, services and overall customer experience, allowing companies to identify areas where they need to improve and make changes accordingly. Furthermore, the results of customer satisfaction surveys can be used to inform marketing and product development strategies, as well as to measure customer loyalty and retention.
